column3: 一样也不卖
卖
不卖
不讲话了
不买东西了
主选单
好
不
出去外面
算了
要怎么做呢？
哦哦，你醒过来啦。

column2: Don't strain yourself,\nnow. Your body is covered\nin bruises.
column3: 不要太勉强自己啦。\n你可是浑身是伤呢。
怎么样？\n有没有哪里特别痛的？

column2: Adol checked himself over.\n...There was some pain,\nbut nothing debilitating.
column3: 亚特鲁摸了一下身体。\n...痛是痛，不过\n还不到不能动弹的程度。

column2: Get some rest. You're in\na clinic at Barbado Port.
column3: 你放心吧。\n这里是巴尔巴多港的医院。
...老爹！\n他醒来了吗？

column2: Ah, Slaff, you're early.\nHow did the meeting go?
column3: 哦，斯拉夫，来这么快啊。\n自卫队的会开得怎么样了？
还不是老样子。\n什么进展都没有。
他呀，是刚刚\n才醒过来的哦。

column2: Glad to see you back among\nthe living!
column3: 你能够恢复意识真是太好了！

column2: Ah, yes, where are my\nmanners? My name is Bludo.\nI own and operate this clinic.
column3: 对了，还没有自我介绍。\n我的名字叫布鲁多。\n这所医院的主人。

column2: This is my son, Slaff. He\nfound you collapsed on the\nbeach, and brought you here.
column3: 这是我儿子斯拉夫。\n你昏倒在海滩附近的森林，\n是他把你抬来这里的哦。

column2: We drove off the Rheboll\nthat attacked you. It was\na real close call.
column3: 我们已经把那些\n攻击你的魔物赶跑了。\n...当时情况真的很危险。

column2: Adol told Slaff his name,\nand expressed his gratitude.
column3: 亚特鲁向斯拉夫道谢，\n并告知自己的名字。

column2: Adol, eh? Good name. Don't\nrecognize you, though...\nWhere are you from?
column3: 亚特鲁吗...好名字。\n你看来不像本地人，是从哪儿来的啊？

column2: Adol explained that he\njourneyed from Promalock\nto Esteria by boat.
column3: 亚特鲁告诉布鲁多等人，\n自己是从普罗玛洛克港乘小船\n来到艾斯塔里亚。
什么...你是从外面来的吗！

column2: Amazing... You're the\nfirst man I know of to\nget past the Stormwall.
column3: 这真是...太惊奇了。\n外面居然有人能够越过\n『岚之结界』过来这里...

column2: What do you two think\nyou're doing?!
column3: 你们两个在干什么！？

column2: Uh-oh, here she comes...\nWatch out, boy, she'll\nchew you up!
column3: 唉呀，啰唆的护士大人\n过来了...

column2: I'll chew YOU up, Slaff,\nif you keep making\ncomments like that!
column3: 哼！\n居然敢讲我啰唆？\n真受不了你们...

column2: The man's wounded, you\nknow. Shouldn't you leave\nhim be? He needs his rest!
column3: 斯拉夫，他是受伤的人吧？\n你们应该让他好好的休息\n不是吗！

column2: That's my Ayla, always\nkeeping us in check. You\nmake a good point, my dear!
column3: 是，我太粗心了。

column2: Yeah, okay. I'll stop\ntalking his ear off.
column3: 那么今天就到此为止吧。

column2: Rest up, Adol. But know\nthis: I'm not done with\nyou yet!
column3: 总之你先好好静养一阵子。\n我们还会再来的。

column2: Under the clinic's care,\nAdol recovered quickly.
column3: 亚特鲁接受细心的照料，\n 一天一天的好起来。
然后经过数日...

column2: Good morning, Adol. You seem to be in\ntip-top shape now!
column3: 哦，亚特鲁。\n你已经可以下床啦？

column2: Still, you should probably take it easy\nfor a bit. Just in case.
column3: 你应该躺在床上好好休养的。
唉呀，可以了。

column2: I suppose a walk around town could do\nyou some good. Just don't overexert\nyourself!
column3: 到街上散散步也没什么，\n适度运动对身体是有益的。

column2: For a boy your age to have slept so\nsoundly, you must have quite a story\nto tell...
column3: 况且以他这个年纪的少年来说，\n要他整天躺在床上不动，\n才是残酷的要求呢。

column2: Adol, the #02portside warehouse#00 has become\nhome base for the town's militia.
column3: ...亚特鲁，#02港口仓库#00是\n自卫队的聚会场所。

column2: Slaff should be there. He can answer\nany questions you might have.
column3: 斯拉夫应该在那里。有什么事不懂的\n你可以去找他了解一下。

column2: Just be careful not to do too much,\ntoo soon!
column3: 注意啊，不能太勉强自己身体啊。

column2: Listen, Adol. There are monsters outside\ntown, so DON'T PUSH YOUR LUCK, okay?
column3: 亚特鲁。\n城外有魔物出没很危险的。\n你要小心一点啊。
要做什么呢？
与布鲁多讲话
与护士讲话
请帮忙回复
希望得到药物
不讲话了

column2: Slaff is well on his way to making the\ntown's militia a force to be reckoned\nwith.
column3: 别看斯拉夫那小子\n组织自卫队耀武扬威的样子...

column2: He's always been one to insist on\nshouldering everyone else's burdens.
column3: 其实他是把所有的事情当成了自己的责任，\n想全部扛起来啊...

column2: A real stubborn one... He never listens\nto a single word I say.
column3: 偏偏他个性固执得要命，\n我讲的话完全听不进去。

column2: He reminds me of someone else in this\nroom...
column3: 真是不知道他是像谁唷...

column2: Adol, I know you're a strapping young\nlad and all...but please, don't over-\nestimate yourself.
column3: 亚特鲁。\n别因为年轻就对自己的体力过度自信。

column2: We don't want you getting hurt again!
column3: 不管怎样，毕竟你还是才刚刚康复的人。
什么啊，你根本就没有受伤啊？

column2: What the heck happened to you? Didn't I\nkeep telling you to rest?!
column3: 你这是怎么回事啊！\n不是再三提醒你要好好静养的吗！

column2: Miss Ayla...please take the reins on\nthis one, if you would.
column3: 爱拉...你就为他治疗一下吧。

column2: Yes, Doctor! Administering antidote...\nMedicating... Emptying blood bucket...\nReviving... Second attempt...
column3: 知道了！\n首先消毒...（擦擦）\n再上药...（擦擦）
然后是绷带...（扎扎）

column2: It stung so badly as to bring Adol to\ntears!
column3: \n...因为很痛很痛\n眼泪差点流出来。

column2: If you can put up with all that, that\nproves to me you've got some spunk!
column3: ...你要记取教训，\n以后要乖一点啊。

column2: Oh, you need to be healed again?
column3: 哦，你又想接受\n细心呵护的治疗吗？

column2: Unfortunately, we're out of the Red\nDigitalis plant needed to make the\nherbs.
column3: 回复药的原料\n毛地黄已经没有了。

column2: But still, you shouldn't need any while\nyou're in town, right?
column3: 你只要乖乖待在城里面，应该就用不到吧？

column2: Well, you seem healthy enough to want to\nbe up and about, but still...take care\nof yourself out there, okay?
column3: 我能够了解你的心情，你想活动筋骨，\n可是活动筋骨也该有个限度吧。
那把剑是...

column2: Fair enough. You want to see Esteria\nwith your own eyes, do you?
column3: 原来如此，你想要亲眼确认\n艾斯塔里亚的现实情况吗...

column2: If you're that determined, I don't plan\nto stop you. But please, be careful!
column3: 既然你心意已决，我也不阻止你。\n但是，你千万一定要小心啊。
要做什么呢？
与布鲁多讲话
与护士讲话
请帮忙回复
希望得到药
不讲话了
